content: @Joshua Procious can you set up a knowledgebase space for mCODE? The "home" page for mCODE is here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CIC/Minimal+Common+Oncology+Data+Element+%28mCODE%29+Project

Hello Mark, you should have permissions to create pages there. Please attempt and let me know if you have any issues. Tips on creating pages here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rOGwEWWut1A&feature=youtu.be
